configuration:
&samtoolsconf;
mapred.input.dir input Input Directory (probably hdfs)
mapred.output.dir output Output directory in hdfs
mapred.cache.archives archive.tar.gz#symlink Archives to add to distributed cache
samtools_bin symlink/samtools Path to samtools binary (Probably in distributed cache)
bcftools_bin symlink/bcftools Path to bcftools binary (Path in distributed cache)
reference_fa symlink/genome.fasta Path to genome fasta file (.fai file must be present as well) (Path in distributed cache)
genome_binsize 1000000 Size of genome chunks on which to call SNPs (default 1000000)
mapred.jar file:///home/user/path/to/jnomics-tools.jar Path to Jnomics Jar
mapred.reduce.tasks 96 Number of reducer tasks
mapred.job.name samtools_snp Name of the Job
mapred.create.symlink yes Create symlinks to files in distributed cache?
